Class Building

java.lang.Object
KI305.Kozak.Lab2.Building
public class Building extends Object
Building class represents a building. it contains - address, floors, area, elevator presense in addition this class implements logging

  • Constructor Details

    • Building

      public Building()
      Creates a Building with default values.

    • Building

      public Building(String address, int floors, float area)
      Creates a Building with address, floors, area.
      Parameters:
      address - building address.
      floors - amount of floors in the building.
      area - building area.

    • Building

      public Building(String address, int floors, float area, boolean hasElevator)
      Creates a Building with address, floors, area and elevator presence.
      Parameters:
      address - building address.
      floors - amount of floors in the building.
      area - building area.
      hasElevator - elevator presence in the building.

    • Building

      public Building(String address, int floors, float area, boolean hasElevator, String logFile)
      Creates a building with every parameter set.
      Parameters:
      address - building address.
      floors - amount of floors in the building.
      area - building area.
      hasElevator - elevator presence in the building.
      logFile - path to log file.

  • Method Details

    • getHasElevator

      public boolean getHasElevator()
      Gets if buiding has a elevator
      Returns:
      true if building has an elevator, else false.

    • setHasElevator

      public void setHasElevator(boolean hasElevator)
      Sets if building has a elevator.
      Parameters:
      hasElevator - is elevator present.

    • displayInfo

      public void displayInfo()
      Display building's info.

    • addFloor

      public void addFloor()
      Adds a new floor to the building. area increases with addition of new floor, if area is 0 or lower, the operation won't go through.

    • getFloorArea

      public float getFloorArea()
      Returns the average area.
      Returns:
      the average area.

      Writes the data to log.

      msg - data to write.
